title: Mediterranean Lentil Stew
steps: rinse lentils|sweat aromatics|simmer until tender|stir in spinach and rest

steps: preheat oven|season chicken|roast until 75°C core temp|rest then carve

steps: rinse chickpeas|toast spices|toss with quinoa and greens|dollop yogurt
